relevant_findings.abdominal_CT: right subphrenic collection, 500 mL of sterile fluid drained

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initially febrile and unhealthy, gradually improved towards the end of the hospital stay.

relevant_findings.blood_culture: Methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA) isolated on day 8

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Despite initial treatment, the patient showed worsening clinical status and developed diskitis.
Condition continued to deteriorate with repeated episodes of bacteremia.
